data.name: Mega Man X7 Sound Collection
data.detailed_description:
Get equipped with the stunningly nostalgic Mega Man X7 Sound Collection, featuring the pulsing beats from the original Mega Man X7!

The 72-minute soundtrack has been reauthored from the original, high quality source material. Includes three high quality formats: MP3 (V0 bitrate), 16-bit FLAC and AAC. (Download size: 187MB for MP3, 510MB for FLAC and 259MB for AAC)

Soundtrack files can be found under the game's installation directory below:
\\Steam\steamapps\common\Mega Man X Legacy Collection 2

©CAPCOM CO., LTD.

-Tracklist-

Composed by Capcom Sound Team (Yuko Komiyama, Shinya "Midnight" Okada, Seiko Kobuchi), Valuewave (Akemi Kimura, Makoto Asai, Teruo Konishi, Shuichi Mizohata, Noriyuki Iwadare, Takuya Miyawaki)

data.short_description: Get equipped with the stunningly nostalgic Mega Man X7 Sound Collection, featuring the pulsing beats from the original Mega Man X7!

fullgame.name: Mega Man X Legacy Collection 2 / ロックマンX アニバーサリー コレクション 2

data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese*, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WINDOWS® 7 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 550 3.2GHz or AMD equivalent or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 660 or ATI Radeon™ HD 7850
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 7000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX® 10.0c or better)
  • Additional Notes: *Recommended Controller Xbox 360 Controller (Windows®7/8/8.1) Xbox One Wireless Controller (Windows®10) *Internet connection required for game activation.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: WINDOWS®10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 3570 3.4GHz or AMD equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 760
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 7000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX® 10.0c or better)
  • Additional Notes: *Recommended Controller Xbox 360 Controller (Windows®7/8/8.1) Xbox One Wireless Controller (Windows®10) *Internet connection required for game activation.

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy Mega Man X7 Sound Collection
